humanwgs.zones: String? (optional); required if backend is set to 'GCP' or 'AWS'
humanwgs.aws_spot_queue_arn: String? (optional); required if backend is set to 'AWS'
humanwgs.aws_on_demand_queue_arn: String? (optional); required if backend is set to 'AWS'
humanwgs.aws_accelerator_type: String? (optional); required if backend is set to 'AWS' and gpu is set to true
humanwgs.hpc_partition: String? (optional); required if backend is set to 'HPC'
humanwgs.hpc_partition_gpu: String? (optional); optional if backend is set to 'HPC' and gpu is set to true
humanwgs.hpc_accelerator_type: String? (optional); optional if backend is set to 'HPC' and gpu is set to true
